description:
### LookAndSaySequenceNextElement

This function takes a string as an input, this string can be assumed to represent a number in a sequence where each number describes what the previous number looked like. e.g. '11' --> '21' --> '1211' --> '111221' and so on. Hence the function needs to return a string which represents the next number in the look and say sequence.

Input: A single string.
Output: A single string.

Example:

``` lookAndSaySequenceNextElement('1') // '11' ```
